title: Mathematical Problem-Solving Enhancement Strategies in Simulation/VR-Based Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: College-level calculus and linear algebra fundamentals
context.additional_context: Strengthen mathematical thinking in the Fourth Industrial Revolution era through VR simulations and blended online-offline activities.

learning_goals: Learners can solve spatial geometry problems with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can implement differential equation modeling processes with 90% completeness using a blended learning platform.
Learners can execute team-based mathematical problem-solving strategies at least three times using collaboration tools in a BYOD environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
